u_dev_tool_operation.u_description: Returns a JSON objejct of the current GlideRecord

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-11 13:59:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>000d426a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b625</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get GlideRecord JSON</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Tools 2.0" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Tools 2.0">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_000d426a2f210110a8ce2b5df699b625</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-11 14:01:19</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description>Returns a JSON objejct of the current GlideRecord</u_description><u_name>Get GlideRecord JSON</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord
//Each operation input is available as a variable witin this script.
//Ex: var userName = name
var jsonObj = {};
for(var key in currentRecord){
	jsonObj[key] = currentRecord.getValue(key);
	
}
result = jsonObj;]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
